$commands: Lists all available commands for Not A Bot
$insult: Gets a random insult from www.insultgenerator.org
$messagestats <n>: Gets a list of group members along with the number of messages they have sent in the last 'n' days; 'n' is an optional parameter and if it is not supplied this command will fetch stats for the group's entire message history
$randommessage <name>: Gets a random message from the group's entire message history for user with nickname 'name'; 'name' is an optional parameter and if it is not supplied this command will fetch a random message regardless of who sent it
